title: CMPD charges suspect with murder in 1990 killing of Kim Thomas
summary: Marion Gales, a longtime person of interest in the 1990 killing of Kim Thomas Friedland, is now charged with murder in the case.
charlotte_impact: A suspect is charged with murder in a 1990 cold case, bringing closure to a long-unsolved crime.

title: Women Allegedly Tortured and Killed Girl, Kept Her in Dog Crate in NC
summary: Three North Carolina women charged in the child abuse death of Dominique Moody allegedly tortured, beat, and kept the girl in a dog crate at a Charlotte home

title: Charlotte man sentenced to life in prison for violent habitual felon status

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Vice President of Business Development
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., Feb. 18, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mosaic Capital Partners, LLC ('Mosaic”) is a private equity firm Based in Charlotte, NC, focused on bringing broad based employee ownership to lower middle market businesses through change-of-control transactions. Mosaic invests in companies with EBITDA of $3 - $15 million across the core sectors of business services, niche manufacturing, and consumer. Mosaic manages over $370M of AUM and has supported over 3,000 employee owners in building substantial long-term wealth.
charlotte_impact: Mosaic Capital Partners is seeking a VP, indicating potential growth.
